mapper.select: SELECT m.id medicalrecordId,u.id doctorId,u.nickname doctorName,a.dept deptId,a.deptname deptName,a.orgname orgName,a.orgcode orgCode,a.id applyId,a.patientid patientId,m.createat createAt FROM t_b_medicalrecord m LEFT JOIN t_p_s_user u ON u.id = m.createby LEFT JOIN t_b_apply a ON a.id = m.applyid WHERE a.patientid = #{patientId}
